span.t: This date is on the future. Make sure it is what you expected.

button.t-attf-class: {{ icon || displayCaret || displayChevron ? 'd-flex align-items-center ' : ''}} {{ displayCaret || displayChevron ? 'pr-1 ' : ''}}

i.t-attf-class: o-dropdown-chevron fa fa-fw ml-auto fa-chevron-{{ state.open ? 'down' : 'right' }}
o-icon-right fa fa-fw mr-n4 fa-caret-{{ state.open ? 'down' : 'right' }}

a.t-att-class: { selected: props.isActive, [props.className]: props.className, 'd-flex': props.removable, 'align-items-center': props.removable, 'justify-content-between': props.removable }

i.class: o-icon-right fa fa-trash btn btn-link text-danger p-0 mr-n3
i.title: Delete item

button.class: fa fa-chevron-left btn btn-secondary o-pager-previous rounded-left
button.title: Previous page

button.class: fa fa-chevron-right btn btn-secondary o-pager-next rounded-right
button.title: Next page

button.t-attf-class: btn btn-light fa fa-lg o-switch-view o-{{ view.type }} {{ view.icon }}

div.class: o-list-selection-box alert alert-info d-inline-flex align-items-center pl-0 px-lg-2 py-0 mb-0 ml-2

main.p:
This update will only consider the records of the current page.
Among the selected records, are valid for this update.
Are you sure you want to perform the following update on those records ?

div.div:
Hit ENTER to SAVE
Hit ESCAPE to DISCARD

Hit ENTER to CREATE
Hit DOWN to navigate to the list below

button.class: btn btn-sm btn-icon fa fa-refresh o-refresh-count
button.title: Refresh

t.div: Select a model to add a filter.

div.t: Match records with the following rule:

button.class: btn btn-sm btn-primary fa fa-plus o-domain-leaf-value-add-tag-button
button.title: Add tag

t.t-value: ['No color', 'Red', 'Orange', 'Yellow', 'Light blue', 'Dark purple', 'Salmon pink', 'Medium blue', 'Dark blue', 'Fushia', 'Green', 'Purple']

button.title: Current state
button.t-attf-class: btn o-arrow-button btn-primary disabled #{isDropdown ? 'dropdown-item bg-primary text-white': ''}

button.title: Not active state, click to change it

t.t-attf-aria-label: Click to change current state to #{i.displayName}

div.div: By clicking Adopt and Sign, I agree that the chosen signature/initials will be a valid electronic representation of my hand-written signature/initials for all purposes when it is used on documents, including legally binding contracts.

div.label: I want to update data (import-compatible export)

div.class: col-12 col-md-6 d-flex o-right-panel mt-3 mt-md-0

div.div:
Get this feature and much more with Verp Enterprise!

New design
Mobile support
